sentence:
• Shares of Merck & Co., Inc. ( MRK ) gained almost 2% after the company reported third quarter earnings per share of $1.07 that surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.98
• Shares of Procter & Gamble Co ( PG ) advanced 3.4% after the company posted fiscal first-quarter earnings of $1.03 per share that beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.98
• Shares of Lockheed Martin Corporation ( LMT ) soared 7.3% after the company reported third quarter earnings per share of $3.61, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $2.86
• Baker Hughes Incorporated's ( BHI ) shares increased 4.3% after the company posted third quarter loss per share of $0.15, narrower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of $0.43
